main.description: Request a service to persistently crawl hosted repos. Expected use is new PDS instances declaring their existence to Relays. Does not require auth.

hostname.description: Hostname of the current service (eg, PDS) that is requesting to be crawled.

cursorHint.description: Optional hint for the current sequence number. If provided and the relay has no previous cursor for this host, the relay will use this value (minus a small buffer) as the initial cursor to ensure events are received. Ignored if the relay already has a cursor for this host.
